name: Lava Keeper
description: The Lava Keeper is a massive elemental that embodies fire and earth, resembling molten rock and magma.
memorable: Its ability to control the battlefield with lava and smoke while being a durable melee and ranged threat makes it a formidable adversary.
goals: To guard volcanic landscapes and punish trespassers.
relations: May interact with fire elementals and earth elementals.
environment: Typically found in volcanic regions or lava fields.
strengths: High hit points, powerful melee and ranged attacks, and innate spellcasting abilities.
weaknesses: Moderate Dexterity limits agility compared to others.
attacks: Can make multiple slam attacks or use devastating lava lob attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Fumarole, creating an area of obscured vision and dealing impressive damage with fire and bludgeoning effects.
senses: Possesses tremorsense out to 120 feet, allowing it to detect nearby creatures regardless of visibility.
skills: Highly skilled in History and Perception, enhancing its awareness and knowledge.
additional_information: Immunity to fire and poison damage.
Resistance to acid and lightning attacks.
Can summon earth or fire elementals once per day.
Can reshape terrain with move earth and stone shape spells.
Creates strategic barriers using wall of fire and wall of stone spells.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting using Wisdom, able to cast move earth and stone shape at will.
test_queries: massive elemental that controls lava and smoke
fire and earth elemental guarding volcanic regions
huge creature with bludgeoning and fire attacks
lava monster with powerful battlefield control
elemental resistant to fire and poison damage
